column.name: description
column.value: Place a chalk on the cushion in line with the black spot, place the cue ball on the brown spot and 2 reds behind the cue ball only showing a small segment in the centre. Aiming at the chalk, hit the cue ball over the 4 spots and back to the tip of your cue.

column.name: target2
column.value: 2. Requires you to stay down on the shot

column.name: description
column.value: Clear the colours touching the reds or the triangles.
